Name: Lintel of Senefru-Nefer
Description: This lintel, a stone or beam above a door, was taken from the door of Senefru-Nefer. It is a rough relief representing the deceased sitting on a chair. In front of him, hieroglyphics give the offering formula and the name of King Djedkare, as well as the name and the titles of the god Osiris, "The Foremost of the Divine Shrine, Lord of Busiris, who is in the embalming tent, Lord of the Thrones of the Two Lands."
